name: Surrealism Project Prototype
description:
"To become truly immortal, a work of art must escape all human limits: logic and common sense will only interfere. But once these barriers are broken it will enter the regions of childhood vision and dream." 
- Giorgio de Chirico

These are two prototypes based on the research of Surrealism as a movement which responds to Realism. Both prototypes aim to emphasize the imagery of the unconcious, which is the core idea behind Surrealism.

Controls:

Prototype 1 - WASD or Arrow Keys

Prototype 2 - Space and Left-mouse-click
